channel.title: [508] Change Start Location/coords command
channel.description: How do i change the start location on my 508, also how do i make ::mypos command

item.title: [508] Change Start Location/coords command
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

For one, the “Start” location can be found either in Login, or Player classes varying from the source you have. And for the ‘::MyPos’ command, your server possibly already has it. Try typing ‘::Coords’. If that doesn’t work, add this in Commands.java -

else if (cmd[0].equals("mypos") && p.rights > 1) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<col=000088>X:<col=880000> " +p.absX+ "</col> <col=000088>Y:<col=880000>" +p.absY+ "</col> <col=000088>H:<col=880000>" +p.heightLevel+ "."); }

The code above is just a basic coordinate’s command, which allows you to view your coords whenever you wish.

Read full topic
